description:
A virgin, neet, deadbeat game boy. The one-half of http://anidb.net/ch67042 [『　　』] and http://anidb.net/ch62620 [Shiro]`s older brother. He excels at bargaining and has excellent skill in mind-reading. Since his gaming style invokes inspiration, conversion of ideas, and overturning premises, Sora excels at games which include lots of unidentified variables.
Source: ANN
name: Sora
